channel.title: Service Link on CDS Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Service Link on CDS Documentation

item.title: Service Requirement Nginx
item.description: Add the service requirement Name: mypg. This will be the service hostname Type: service Value: nginx:1.11.1. This is the name of docker image to link to current job And a requirement model which allow you to execute apt-get install -y postgresql-client worker-model-docker-simple.md Add a step of type script docker image nginx:1.11.1 start a nginx at startup. So, it’s now available on http://mynginx curl -v -X GET http://mynginx Execute Pipeline

item.title: Service Requirement PostgreSQL
item.description: Add the service requirement Requirement Service Name: mypg. This will be the service hostname Type: service Value: postgres:9.5.3 POSTGRES_USER=myuser POSTGRES_PASSWORD=mypassword. This is the name of docker image to link to current job And a requirement model which allow you to execute apt-get install -y postgresql-client, see HowTo Add a step of type script docker image postgres:9.5.3 start a postgresql at startup. So, it’s now available on mypg
